item.description: A seminar sponsored by the New Haven Center of Light, a school for Christian mysticism. In eastern philosophy, the feminine aspect represents the parts of ourselves that are intuitive and receptive in nature. In our society these aspects are sometimes unknown, overlooked and undervalued as compared to the well-practiced masculine aspect of reasoning and accomplishment. The divine feminine is an integral tool that each person has to make decisions, to access new ideas and create lives filled with wisdom, knowledge and truth. This seminar will give you an experience of the inner workings of the divine feminine.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: The Divine Feminine: She Who Dwells Within
